info.name: Dark Google FTW (Nightmode for Google)
info.description: Google search nightmode experiments... Works on most basic google search functions incl. images & maps. - Dark Google Maps (invert map): here --- Check out my other "Dark" styles: ₪ Soundcloud ₪ Discogs ₪ TabletPCReview & NotebookReview Forum ₪ Computerbase ₪ Yandex ₪ Global dark style ₪ and more...

17.11.2011 - now with iGoogle support!
